item.title: Genokids launches in Early Access on October 2
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Expected to remain in Early Access for two years.

Genokids will launch in Early Access for PC via Steam on October 2, developer Nukefist announced.

The Early Access version will feature the game’s first of three acts, with the full release planned to add two more chapters, including new levels, secrets, abilities, power-ups, enemies, bosses, weapons, and two additional movesets for the remaining main characters yet to appear.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

Genokids is a game about MOTIVATION, a fast-paced hack-and-slash where a band of musicians take down an alien invasion!

  • Play as  four characters at the same time, each with their own moveset!
  • Smoothly navigate through the ruins of Las Divas using slick parkour moves.
  • Style your way through waves of enemies, what’s the point of saving the world if you don’t look cool doing it?
  • Follow the bombastic tale of this band of misfits as they make the impossible, possible.

A bizarre music band named Genokids is rocking one of their best concerts to date when The Infinite Empire of Zenodia decides to invade Earth and assimilate mankind, landing right on top of the band and ruining both their concert and mood.

Seamlessly swap between all four characters in the middle of a fight. Execute multiple actions at the same time!

Go beyond your limits and enter HYPER MODE!

MOTIVATION IS MANKIND’S GREATEST WEAPON!

Watch a new trailer below.

Early Access Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/genokids-launches-in-early-access-on-october-2

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 ‘Multiplayer Gameplay Reveal’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Plus a deep dive into everything multiplayer.

Publisher Activision and developers Treyarch and Raven Software have released the multiplayer gameplay reveal trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, as well as published a new multiplayer deep dive detailing everything from new modes to maps, weapons, Perks, Field Upgrades, and more.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam, Microsoft Store, and Battle.net on November 14. It will also be available via Game Pass.

Watch the trailer below.

Multiplayer Gameplay Reveal Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/call-of-duty-black-ops-7-multiplayer-gameplay-reveal-trailer
